Articles.Content:
Hey guys, Im new to KSP and very new to forums. I was wondering how do I get the rocks, arches and terrain features I see on the Mun and Minmus in tutorial videos?..cheers

Edited March 21, 2014 by Harr00

Welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay! Don't be shy to ask a question, we don't bite!

The rocks you see that are scattered on the ground are in the settings, graphic subsection. It's called terrain scatters!

Also, can you explain which terrain features are you talking about?

And lastly, the arches are one of the game's easter eggs.

Greetings! All the rocks on the ground are, as said above, graphic effects, so you'll have to change that to high if you want those details. Mind you, that might put a strain on you system, so if it lags, turn it down again.

This game is full of easter eggs, the arches being some of them. Have a look on the forum to find out about the others, then build something epic to find them. Happy launchings!
welcome my friend I hope you enjoy hours of success, getting overconfident, failing and then fixing it and getting another ego boost and repeating the process all over again

I've been playing KSP for a long time, and I only ever saw a Mun arch in the Demo version. I decided to play it again to see my ridiculous rockets one last time, and as I was leaving the Mun (If I was going to it I would have landed nearby) I saw a Mun arch. From a 10k or more orbit. These things are incredibly hard to miss, apparently.

Anyways, good luck on your Easter Egg Hunt!

Thanks guys

rocks everywhere now!!!....lol

You're welcome! We're glad we've helped you out.
